Smart Coffee Mug: A coffee mug with a built-in AI assistant that can track your caffeine intake, remind you when it's time for a refill, and even suggest healthy alternatives based on your caffeine habits. (Confidence Score: 0.8)
Heat-Sensitive Mug: A coffee mug that changes color or design when hot liquid is poured into it, creating a unique and eye-catching visual effect. (Confidence Score: 0.7)

Self-Stirring Mug: A coffee mug with a built-in stirrer that automatically stirs your coffee for you, ensuring that your coffee is always well-mixed and at the perfect temperature. (Confidence Score: 0.8)
Temperature-Control Mug: A coffee mug that can adjust the temperature of your coffee to your liking, whether you prefer it hot, warm, or iced. (Confidence Score: 0.9)

Augmented Reality Mug: A coffee mug that uses augmented reality technology to display fun and interactive 3D animations or designs when you pour your coffee, creating a unique and entertaining experience. (Confidence Score: 0.9)
